title: Mottled dragon hide
data:
***Obsolete**: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.*

| Name                                                           | Mottled dragon hide |
| :------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------- |
| Size to wear                                                   | Any                 |
| [Armour Class](/Armour_class "Armour class")                   | 3                   |
| [Encumbrance rating](/Encumbrance_rating "Encumbrance rating") | -5                  |
| Maximum Enchantment                                            | +0                  |
| Grants                                                         | rSticky             |
| Time to Wear                                                   | 5                   |

|   |                                                                                                                                                                           |
| - | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | The weirdly-patterned scaly skin of a mottled dragon. It may be turned into proper armour by magical means. Its smooth surface lets sticky flames flow off it like water. |

**Mottled dragon hide** is a light suit of body [armour](/Armour "Armour") (only slightly heavier than [leather armour](/Leather_armour "Leather armour")) that provides resistance to [Sticky Flame](/Sticky_Flame "Sticky Flame"). It can occasionally be obtained by butchering a [mottled dragon](/Mottled_dragon "Mottled dragon") [corpse](/Corpse "Corpse"). Enchanting it with [scroll of enchant armour](/Scroll_of_enchant_armour "Scroll of enchant armour") turns it into a much more useful [mottled dragon armour](/Mottled_dragon_armour "Mottled dragon armour").

## History

In [0.19](/0.19 "0.19"), mottled dragon hide, along with all other hides, was removed.

html:
Mottled dragon hide

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Obsolete: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.
Name Mottled dragon hide
Size to wear Any
Armour Class 3
Encumbrance rating -5
Maximum Enchantment +0
Grants rSticky
Time to Wear 5


The weirdly-patterned scaly skin of a mottled dragon. It may be turned into proper armour by magical means. Its smooth surface lets sticky flames flow off it like water.

Mottled dragon hide is a light suit of body armour (only slightly heavier than leather armour) that provides resistance to Sticky Flame. It can occasionally be obtained by butchering a mottled dragon corpse. Enchanting it with scroll of enchant armour turns it into a much more useful mottled dragon armour.

History

In 0.19, mottled dragon hide, along with all other hides, was removed.

'''Mottled dragon hide''' is a light suit of body [[armour]] (only slightly heavier than [[leather armour]]) that provides resistance to [[Sticky Flame]]. It can occasionally be obtained by butchering a [[mottled dragon]] [[corpse]]. Enchanting it with [[scroll of enchant armour]] turns it into a much more useful [[mottled dragon armour]].

==History==
